name: Votegasm
description:
Votegasm is a platformer where you try to educate people to earn their votes, which you will need, in order to get rid of the biggest disinformation source of all time

WASD to move
Left mouse button to throw book to ignorant people
Right mouse button to throw votes to Mr.Orange

All the artwork created by me in 48hours during the gamejam

music and sound effects are license free

Due to the bad time management I couldn't finish the game in the way I wanted but I hope you like it
